<h3 id="X22757">X(22757) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL AND OUTER-GREBE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^4-2*(b+c)*b*c*a+(a+b-c)*(a-b+c)*S-(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2)  :  :
<p>X(22757) lies on these lines:
{1,8904}, {3,3640}, {6,41}, {36,5588}, {55,5604}, {104,10784}, {956,5688}, {958,5590}, {999,11371}, {1160,11249}, {1270,2975}, {3428,11825}, {5594,22654}, {5860,11194}, {5870,10920}, {6201,22753}, {6214,22758}, {6226,22504}, {6257,18237}, {6262,12773}, {6266,22778}, {6268,22773}, {6269,22774}, {6272,22779}, {6274,22780}, {6276,22781}, {6278,22624}, {6280,22595}, {6320,22514}, {7726,22583}, {7733,22586}, {8199,11493}, {8206,11492}, {8218,22761}, {8219,22762}, {8975,22763}, {9883,22565}, {9930,22659}, {9995,22744}, {10041,22766}, {10049,22767}, {10793,22520}, {10924,22759}, {10926,22760}, {10928,10932}, {10930,22768}, {11389,22479}, {11902,22755}, {11917,22765}, {12513,12628}, {12698,22770}, {12754,22775}, {12802,22777}, {12804,19478}, {12806,19159}, {12808,22782}, {13270,22560}, {13283,19162}, {13691,22783}, {13743,16131}, {13811,22784}, {13950,22764}, {18511,18761}, {22680,22700}, {22771,22854}, {22772,22899}, {22776,22947}</p>
<p>
X(22757) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 3640, 11498), (56, 22769, 22756)<br>
